description: Comprehensive Infrastructure Overview - Single pane of glass for homelab monitoring

panels.description: ICMP latency for core infrastructure devices
Proxmox VE memory usage with used/total
panels.title: Memory

panels.description: LXC container disk usage over time
panels.title: LXC Disk Usage

panels.description: Proxmox disk temperatures from node exporter
panels.title: Disk Temperatures

panels.description: HTTP/HTTPS service response time - individual tiles with latency
panels.title: Services

panels.description: CPU usage for all LXC guests on Proxmox

targets.expr: ((pve_cpu_usage_ratio{instance="proxmox"} / pve_cpu_usage_limit{instance="proxmox"}) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info{instance="proxmox"}) * 100 and on(id, instance) pve_up{instance="proxmox"} == 1

panels.title: Guests CPU usage

panels.description: Memory usage for all LXC guests on Proxmox

targets.expr: (pve_memory_usage_bytes{instance="proxmox"} / pve_memory_size_bytes{instance="proxmox"} * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info{instance="proxmox"}) * 100 and on(id, instance) pve_up{instance="proxmox"} == 1

panels.title: Guests memory usage

targets.expr: (rate(pve_network_receive_bytes{instance="proxmox"}[5m]) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info{instance="proxmox"}) and on(id, instance) pve_up{instance="proxmox"} == 1
(rate(pve_network_transmit_bytes{instance="proxmox"}[5m]) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info{instance="proxmox"}) and on(id, instance) pve_up{instance="proxmox"} == 1

((rate(pve_disk_write_bytes{instance="proxmox"}[5m]) + rate(pve_disk_read_bytes{instance="proxmox"}[5m])) * on(id, instance) group_left(name, type) pve_guest_info{instance="proxmox"}) and on(id, instance) pve_up{instance="proxmox"} == 1
